title: Talking About a Tortilla
itunes:title: Talking About a Tortilla
description:
Kate reclines as Jacqueline takes Kate through a depressive swirl. John Lithgow’s Churchill, the question of prosthetics and realism in film. Stella Adler. HBD, Kate. The Lychee Martini @ JAR. That which is overhead at the pool. Tearing the curtains, throwing the laptop. Experimenting with not collapsing. JN's Grub Street breakdown. A warm ceramic lantern. The fear of being misunderstood as some breadless and soulless hag. JN begs for a Peabody with more tears.

.

.

.

.

.

This episode was edited and engineered by C. Tweedie

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
